sentences.en: For my work in South Africa I was given by Lord Hardinge a Kaiser - i - Hind Gold Medal.
sentences.cn: 哈丁勋爵还为我在南非的表现发给我一枚凯泽 - 依 - 欣德金质勋章.

sentences.en: Hadshe inflicted any wrong upon Germany which the Kaiser bound to redress?
sentences.cn: 她使德国遭受了必须要皇帝来纠正的冤屈 吗 ?

sentences.en: He became the head of the Kaiser Whilhem Institute of Theoretical Physics.
sentences.cn: 他成了威廉国王的物理理论研究所的所长.

sentences.en: He was persuaded to become director of Theoretical Physics in the Kaiser Wilhelm Institute.
sentences.cn: 人们说服他担任凯撒-威廉学院理论物理学的学科主任.

sentences.en: Kaiser , maybe you are one of those typical british hooligans and so I understand your answer.
sentences.cn: 也许你就是那些典型的英国流浪其中之一,所以我理解你的回答.

sentences.en: Kaiser are you speaking with me?
Kaiser Kuo has a similar story.
sentences.cn: 郭怡广也有类似的经历.

sentences.en: Lois Kaiser : [ talking through sex hotline ] Oh! I can feel your balls up against my ass!
sentences.cn: 洛伊斯·凯瑟: ( 以性感的口吻 ) 哦! 我感觉你那玩意儿正顶着我的屁股!

sentences.en: Rachel Vismerf Kaiser Permanente research division led the study.
sentences.cn: KP研究部门的RW女士领到了这项研究.

sentences.cn: 另配裹有生菜丝 、 西红柿 、 洋葱和炸薯条的凯撒卷.

sentences.en: The atmosphere in Wilder Kaiser is laid back and friendly and young skiers are especially welcome.
sentences.cn: 皇帝山的游玩氛围是悠闲和友好的,而且特别受年轻滑雪者欢迎.

sentences.en: The French refused, and the Kaiser appealed to Roosevelt for support.
sentences.cn: 法国人拒绝, 德皇乃求助于罗斯福.

sentences.en: This is the " Kaiser Wilhelm " memorial.
sentences.cn: 这是德国 威黑姆 国王的纪念台.
